remarks: Lemma for ~ emcl .  The series ` F ` and ` G ` are sequences of real numbers that approach ` gamma ` from above and below, respectively. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Jul-2014.)
statement:
emcl.1 $e |- F = ( n e. NN |-> ( sum_ m e. ( 1 ... n ) ( 1 / m ) - ( log ` n ) ) ) $.
emcl.2 $e |- G = ( n e. NN |-> ( sum_ m e. ( 1 ... n ) ( 1 / m ) - ( log ` ( n + 1 ) ) ) ) $.
emcllem1 $p |- ( F : NN --> RR /\ G : NN --> RR ) $.
$d m n $.
$d m n $.
